Post.title: OAuth1,OAuth2
Post.content:
OAuthstackoverflowOAuth1.0aOAuth2

OAuth 1.0aOne Leg ->Two Leg -> Three Legged
OAuth 2:Two Leg ->Three Legged (Refresh Token)

legOAuth5

OAuth1.0a

2.1 OAuth 1.0a (One Leg)

    • oauth_token Empty String
    • oauth_consumer_key
    • oauth_timestamp
    • oauth_nonce
    • oauth_signature
    • oauth_signature_method
    • oauth_version Optional

2.2 OAuth 1.0a (Two Legs)

  1. Request Token
    • oauth_consumer_key
    • oauth_timestamp
    • oauth_nonce
    • oauth_signature
    • oauth_signature_method
    • oauth_version Optional
  2. Request Token
    • oauth_token
    • oauth_token_secret
    • Additional Parameters / Arguments
  3. Request TokenAccess Token
    • oauth_token Request Token
    • oauth_consumer_key
    • oauth_nonce
    • oauth_signature
    • oauth_signature_method
    • oauth_version
  4. Access TokenToken Secret
  5. Access TokenToken Secret

2.3 OAuth 1.0a (Three Legged)

  1. Request Token
    • oauth_consumer_key
    • oauth_timestamp
    • oauth_nonce
    • oauth_signature
    • oauth_signature_method
    • oauth_version Optional
  2. Request Token
    • oauth_token
    • oauth_token_secret
    • oauth_callback_confirmed
    • Additional Parameters / Arguments
  3. URL
    • oauth_token
    • oauth_token
    • oauth_verifier
  7. Request TokenAccess Token
    • oauth_token Request Token
    • oauth_consumer_key
    • oauth_nonce
    • oauth_signature
    • oauth_signature_method
    • oauth_version
    • oauth_verifier
  8. Access TokenToken Secret
  9. Access TokenToken Secret

OAuth2

3.1 OAuth 2 (Two Legged)

3.1.1

    • grant_type = client_credentials
      AuthorizationAuthorization: Basic Base64(client_id:client_secret) header
    • client_id
    • client_secret
  2. Access Token
    • access_token
    • expires_in
    • token_type

3.1.2

    • response_type = token
    • redirect_uri This is a server-side Redirection URI hosted by the provider or yourself.
    • scope
    • state Optional
    • client_id
    • username
    • password
  3. access_tokenredirect_uri
  4. redirect_uri
  5. redirect_uriHTMLHTMLaccess_token

3.1.3

    • username
    • password
    • grant_type = password
    • username
    • password
      urlgrant_type=password&username=my_username&password=my_password
      Authorizationheader
    • client_id
    • client_secret
      url
      grant_type=password&username=my_username&password=my_password&client_id=random_string&client_secret=random_secret
  3. Access Toke
    • access_token
    • expires_in
    • token_type

3.2 OAuth 2 (Three Legged)

    • client_id
    • redirect_uri
    • response_type
    • state Optional; Unique identifier to protect against CSRF
    • scope Optional; what data your application can access.
      url
      oauth_service/login/oauth/authorize?client_id=3MVG9lKcPoNINVB&redirect_uri=http://localhost/oauth/code_callback&scope=user
  3. redirect_url
    • code
    • state
  4. codeAccess Token
    • client_id
    • client_secret
    • code
    • redirect_uri Optional;
    • grant_type = authorization_code
  5. client_idclient_secretredirect_urlACCESS_TOKEN
    • access_token
    • expires_in
    • refresh_token
  6. ACCESS_TOKENsessioncookie

3.3 OAuth 2 (Refresh Token token)

OAuth2Tokenrefresh_tokentoken

    • grant_type = refresh_token
    • scope Optional; Cannot have any new scopes not previously defined.
    • refresh_token
    • client_id
    • client_secret
    • access_token
    • issued_at

stackoverflow

QOpenIDOAuth
AOpenIDOAuthOpenIDOAuth

QOAuth2OAuth1OAuth2OAuth1 OAuth1OAuth2OAuth2OAuthOAuth2
AOAuth2OAuthOAuth1.0OAuth2.0
OAuth2.0TwitterAPIHMACOAuth2.0HTTPS
OAuth2.0
OAuth2.0OAuth1.0Twitter OAuth2.0
OAuth2.0OAuth

QOAuth2stateCSRF
Astate$state = md5(uniqid(rand(), TRUE));sessionsatateOAuth2CSRF

---
layout: post
title: "OAuth1,OAuth2"
date: 2013-08-11 10:55
comments: true
tags: 
	- web
---       
##****     
OAuthstackoverflowOAuth1.0aOAuth2
> OAuth 1.0aOne Leg ->Two Leg -> Three Legged            
> OAuth 2:Two Leg ->Three Legged (Refresh Token)

legOAuth5

<!--more-->
##**OAuth1.0a**
**2.1 OAuth 1.0a (One Leg)**

1.            
	* oauth_token Empty String             
	* oauth_consumer_key                  
	* oauth_timestamp                   
	* oauth_nonce                    
	* oauth_signature                  
	* oauth_signature_method              
	* oauth_version Optional                  
2.                  
3.                 

**2.2 OAuth 1.0a (Two Legs)**

1.  Request Token                 
	* oauth_consumer_key                          
	* oauth_timestamp                     
	* oauth_nonce                        
	* oauth_signature                  
	* oauth_signature_method                       
	* oauth_version Optional                      
2. Request Token                   
	* oauth_token                    
	* oauth_token_secret                  
	* Additional Parameters / Arguments                   
3. Request TokenAccess Token                      
	* oauth_token Request Token                    
	* oauth_consumer_key                   
	* oauth_nonce                 
	* oauth_signature                      
	* oauth_signature_method                    
	* oauth_version                           
4. Access TokenToken Secret    
5. Access TokenToken Secret

**2.3 OAuth 1.0a (Three Legged)**

1.  Request Token                
	* oauth_consumer_key                       
	* oauth_timestamp                       
	* oauth_nonce                       
	* oauth_signature                       
	* oauth_signature_method                       
	* oauth_version Optional                       
2. Request Token                       
	* oauth_token                       
	* oauth_token_secret                       
	* oauth_callback_confirmed                       
	*  Additional Parameters / Arguments                       
3. URL                       
	* oauth_token                       
4.                        
5.                        
6.                        
	* oauth_token                       
	* oauth_verifier                       
7. Request TokenAccess Token                       
	* oauth_token Request Token                       
	* oauth_consumer_key                       
	* oauth_nonce                       
	* oauth_signature                       
	* oauth_signature_method                       
	* oauth_version                       
	* oauth_verifier                       
8. Access TokenToken Secret                       
9. Access TokenToken Secret                       

##**OAuth2**         

** 3.1 OAuth 2 (Two Legged)**

3.1.1               

1.                    
	* grant_type = client_credentials                   
AuthorizationAuthorization: Basic Base64(client_id:client_secret) header                   
	* client_id                   
	* client_secret                   
2. Access Token                   
	* access_token                   
	* expires_in                   
	* token_type                   

3.1.2                

1.                                                 
	* response_type = token                      
	* redirect_uri This is a server-side Redirection URI hosted by the provider or yourself.                      
	* scope                      
	* state Optional                      
	* client_id                      
2.                       
	* username                      
	* password                      
3. access_tokenredirect_uri                      
4. redirect_uri                      
5. redirect_uriHTMLHTMLaccess_token                  

3.1.3                   

1.                    
	* username                   
	* password                   
2.                    
	* grant_type = password                   
	* username                   
	* password                   
urlgrant_type=password&username=my_username&password=my_password                   
Authorizationheader                   
	* client_id                   
	* client_secret                   
url                   
grant_type=password&username=my_username&password=my_password&client_id=random_string&client_secret=random_secret                   
3. Access Toke                   
	* access_token                   
	* expires_in                   
	* token_type                   

** 3.2 OAuth 2 (Three Legged) **

1.                     
	* client_id                    
	* redirect_uri                    
	* response_type                    
	* state Optional; Unique identifier to protect against CSRF                    
	* scope Optional; what data your application can access.                    
url                    
oauth_service/login/oauth/authorize?client_id=3MVG9lKcPoNINVB&redirect_uri=http://localhost/oauth/code_callback&scope=user                    
2.                     
3. redirect_url                     
	* code                    
	* state                    
4. codeAccess Token                    
	* client_id                    
	* client_secret                    
	* code                    
	* redirect_uri Optional;                    
	* grant_type = "authorization_code"                    
5. client_idclient_secretredirect_urlACCESS_TOKEN                    
	* access_token                    
	* expires_in                    
	* refresh_token                    
6. ACCESS_TOKENsessioncookie   

** 3.3 OAuth 2 (Refresh Token token) **

OAuth2Tokenrefresh_tokentoken    

1.                   
	* grant_type = "refresh_token"                      
	* scope Optional; Cannot have any new scopes not previously defined.                     
	* refresh_token                     
	* client_id                     
	* client_secret                     
2.                      
	* access_token                     
	* issued_at

date: 2014-08-31 16:03

tags: 
	-  
	- hexo
---       

[hexo-theme-yilia](https://github.com/litten/hexo-theme-yilia)  [hexo](https://github.com/tommy351/hexo) 2.4+     


octopresshexoYilia

1. 
2. jiathisbaiducdn
3. 
4. IE678

<!-- more -->

##

####**1. **

``` bash
$ git clone https://github.com/litten/hexo-theme-yilia.git themes/yilia
```

####**2. **

hexo `_config.yml`  `theme: yilia`

####**3. **

``` bash
cd themes/yilia
git pull
```

##

####****
![](http://littendomo.sinaapp.com/yilia/yilia-pc1.png)        

####****
![](http://littendomo.sinaapp.com/yilia/yilia-pc2.png)

`_config.yml`

```
# Header
menu:
  : /
  : /archives
  # : /tags/

# SubNav
subnav:
  github: "https://github.com/litten"
  weibo: "http://weibo.com/litten225"
  rss: "http://feed.feedsky.com/litten"
  # facebook: "/"
  # google: "/"
  # twitter: "/"
  # linkedin: "/"

rss: /atom.xml

# Content
excerpt_link: more
fancybox: true

# Miscellaneous

favicon: /favicon.png

avatar: "https://avatars2.githubusercontent.com/u/2024949?v=2&s=150"
share: true
duoshuo: true
```

---
layout: post
title: ""
date: 2014-08-01 23:52
comments: true
tags: 
	- html5 
	-  
	- js 
	- github
---       

#Kael-Qrcode 

> html5 canvas                   

[github here](https://github.com/litten/Kael-Qrcode)              
dotaKael Kael-Qrcode        

   
<!-- more -->
###  Usage:

**1**

**Demo Base - **

```js
	var kaelBase = new KaelQrcode();
	kaelBase.init(document.getElementById("qr-base"), "hello KaelQrcode");
```

**2**

           

**Demo Pic - **

            

![demo](http://littendomo.sinaapp.com/kaer-qrcode/qrcode-pic.jpg)
```js
	var kaelPic = new KaelQrcode();
	kaelBase.init(document.getElementById("qr-pic"), {
		text : "hello KaelQrcode",
		size: 300,
		img: {
			src : "kael-ico.jpg",
			border: "#fff"
		}
	});
```
**Demo Sae - **        

           

![demo](http://littendomo.sinaapp.com/kaer-qrcode/qrcode-sea.jpg)
```js
	var kaelSea = new KaelQrcode();
	kaelSea.init(document.getElementById("qr-sea"), {
		text : "hello KaelQrcode",
		size: 300,
		color: {
			'0': 'rgb(1, 158, 213)',
			'0.2': 'rgb(30, 169, 224)',
			'0.6': 'rgb(0, 120, 191)',
			'1': 'rgb(1, 119, 255)'
		},
		background: "#d3e3f0",
		type: "round"
	});
```

**Demo Iron - **     

            

![demo](http://littendomo.sinaapp.com/kaer-qrcode/qrcode-iron.jpg)
```js
	var kaelIron = new KaelQrcode();
	kaelIron.init(document.getElementById("qr-iron"), {
		text : "hello KaelQrcode",
		size: 300,
		color: {
			'0': 'rgb(30, 30, 30)',
			'0.2': 'rgb(100, 100, 100)',
			'1': 'rgb(40, 40, 40)'
		},
		background: {
			'0': 'rgb(233, 233, 233)',
			'0.2': 'rgb(246, 246, 246)',
			'1': 'rgb(212, 212, 212)'
		},
		shadow: true
	});
```
**Demo Iron - **      

        

![demo](http://littendomo.sinaapp.com/kaer-qrcode/qrcode-point.jpg)
```js
	var kaelPoint = new KaelQrcode();
	kaelPoint.init(document.getElementById("qr-point"), {
		text : "hello KaelQrcode",
		size: 300,
		color: "#50528f",
		background: "e7e0cf",
		pointColor: "#ee256c",
		type: "round"
	});
```

###  Todo

mediatorsetupHomeGuestPlayer modelplayermediatorplayedscorescorescoreboardkeypress

colleaguemediatorcolleaguemediatormediatorcolleague
Post.raw: --- layout: post title: "(mediator)" date: 2013-01-02 12:36 comments: true tags: - coffeescript - --- ![](/assets/blogImg/mediator1.jpg) > ABBA ##**** **** ##**** [demo](/assets/demo/mediator/demo.html) ##**demo coffeescript50** Playerpointsnameprototypeplaymediator ```coffeescript Player = (name)-> @points = 0 @name = name Player::play = -> @points++ mediator.played() ``` scoreboardMVCV(view)updatescoremediator(score)(scoreboard) ```coffeescript scoreboard = element: document.getElementById "results" update:(score)-> msg = '' for key,value of score if score.hasOwnProperty key msg = msg+"#{key}:#{value}" @element.innerHTML = msg diff = score.Home - score.Guest if diff > 15 alert "Home Win!" location.reload(); else if diff <-15 alert "Guest Win!" location.reload(); else document.getElementById('barGuest').style.width = 150 + (diff*10) + 'px' ``` mediatorsetupHomeGuestPlayer modelplayermediatorplayedscorescorescoreboardkeypress ```coffeescript mediator = players:{} setup:-> players = @players players.home = new Player 'Home' players.guest = new Player 'Guest' played:-> players = @players score = Home: players.home.points Guest:players.guest.points scoreboard.update score keypress:(e)-> e = e|| window.event keycode = e.which if keycode is 102 mediator.players.home.play() return if keycode is 106 mediator.players.guest.play() return ``` ```coffeescript mediator.setup() window.onkeypress = mediator.keypress ``` ##**** colleaguemediatorcolleaguemediatormediatorcolleague

Post.title: web worker
Post.content:

John ResigHow JavaScript Timers WorkHTML5web worker

worker

web workerapihtml5 postmessagenode.jssocket.io

  1. postMessage(data)
  2. onmessage(event)

web worker:

  1. : self.close()
  2. : worker.terminate()

w3cweb workerworker(Dedicated Worker)worker(Shared Worker)

worker

web workerworker.js

var worker = new Worker("worker.js");

worker

worker.onmessage = function (event) {
    alert(event.data);
};

worker.js 

postMessage('helloimweb');

web workerjson

var worker = new Worker("worker.js");
worker.onmessage = function (event) {
    document.getElementById("result").innerHTML=event.data;
};

function start(){
    worker.postMessage({'cmd': 'start', 'msg': 'start'});
}

function pause(){
    worker.postMessage({'cmd': 'pause', 'msg': 'pause'});
}

function stop(){
    worker.postMessage({'cmd': 'stop', 'msg': 'stop'});
}

function msg(){
    worker.postMessage({'msg': 'hello imweb'});
}

worker.js

self.onmessage = function (e) {
    var data = e.data;
      switch (data.cmd) {
    case 'start':
        taskStart(); //
          postMessage('WORKER DO: ' + data.msg);
          break;
    case 'pause':
        taskPause();
          postMessage('WORKER DO: ' + data.msg);
          break;
    case 'stop':
          postMessage('WORKER DO: ' + data.msg);
          self.close(); //web worker
          break;
    default:
          postMessage('MESSAGE: ' + data.msg);
      };
};

wokertaskStart()web workerUI

worker

workerworker,

var worker = new SharedWorker('shared-worker.js');
worker.port.onmessage = function(e) {
    msg = 'Someone just said "' + e.data.message + '". That is message number ' + e.data.counter;
    console.log(msg);
};
worker.port.postMessage('hello shared worker!');

shared-worker.js: 

var counter = 0;
var connections = [];
onconnect = function(eConn) {
       var port = eConn.ports[0]; // port

   //
   port.onmessage = function(eMsg) { 
       counter++;
       for (var i=0; i < connections.length; i++) {
           connections[i].postMessage({
               message: eMsg.data,
               counter: counter
           });
       }
   }
   port.start();
   connections.push(port);

Someone just said Hello shared worker! This is message number 1
message number 2

worker.onerror = function(e) {
    console.log(e.filename+"ERROR on line"+e.lineno+",msg:"+e.message);
}

web worker

web workercanvasjsonpscriptweb workerjsonpworker

function tryJsonp(){
    var d = (new Date()).valueOf();
    var jsonp=document.createElement("script");  
    jsonp.type="text/javascript";  
    jsonp.src="worker.js?_="+d;  
    document.getElementsByTagName("head")[0].appendChild(jsonp);
    jsonp.onload = jsonp.onreadystatechange = function(){  
           if(!this.readyState||this.readyState=='loaded'||this.readyState=='complete'){  
               console.log('jsonp: '+ ((new Date()).valueOf() - d));
        }  
    }
}
function tryWorker(){
    var d = (new Date()).valueOf();
    var worker = new Worker("worker.js");
    worker.postMessage({'cmd': 'start', 'msg': 'start'});
    worker.onmessage = function (event) {
        console.log('web worker: '+ ((new Date()).valueOf() - d));
    };
}

1800k

pushstatefallbackurl
```
$.support.pjax = window.history && window.history.pushState
// Fallback
if ( !$.support.pjax ) {
  $.pjax = function( options ) {
    window.location = $.isFunction(options.url) ? options.url() : options.url
  }
  $.fn.pjax = function() { return this }
}
```

EzioEzioSophiaEzio

Ezio

When I was a young man,

I had liberty, but I did not see it.

I had time, but I did not know it.

And I had love, but I did not feel it.

Many decades would pass before I understood the meaning of all three.

And now, the twilight of my life, misunderstanding has past into contentment.

Love, liberty, and time: once was so disposable, are the fuels that drive me forward.

And love, most especially, mia caro.

For you, our children, our brothers and sisters.

And for the vast and wonderful world that gives us lives and keeps us guessing,

endless affectionmio Sofia,

Forever yours, Ezio Auditore
Ezio Auditore
